meanings.definition: A colorless crystalline compound with basic properties, forming uric acid on oxidation.
meanings.sent1: The scientist studied the purines under a microscope.
meanings.sent2: Purines are important building blocks for DNA and RNA.
meanings.sent3: The purines decided to throw a party in the nucleus.
meanings.sent4: Her love for science was as strong as the bonds between purines.
meanings.sent5: The purines sparkled like tiny crystals in the cell.

meanings.definition: Any of a group of compounds that are derivatives of purine, including uric acid and caffeine.
meanings.sent1: She avoided foods high in purines to manage her gout.
meanings.sent2: Purines can be found in various foods like meat and seafood.
meanings.sent3: The purines in the coffee beans gave the drink its kick.
meanings.sent4: His energy levels were as high as the purines in his bloodstream.
meanings.sent5: The purines danced together in the chemical reaction.
